sense.def: Pathological Condition of BCGM 胻疮 heng chuang , shin sores. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry shi 豕 quoting Qian jin bei ji fang 千金備急方 22: 在腨 胫间喜生疮，中水恶露寒冻不瘥，经年成骨疽，亦名胻疮 , “There is a tendency for sores to develop in the region of the calves and shins. If they are subjected to water, malign dew, and freezing, and if this is not healed, after several years this develops into a bone impediment-illness. It is also called ‘shin sores’”. writes: 胻疽青爛：生於胻脛間，惡水淋漓，經年瘡冷，敗為深疽青黑， 好肉虛腫，百藥不瘥，或瘥而復發 , “ Shin impediment-illnesses with a bluish-green and festering color develop in the region of the shin. Bad water leaks from them. In the course of a year the sores become cold and rot and turn into a deep-lying impediment illness with greenish-blue to black color. [What is left of] good flesh is hollow and swollen. No medication will achieve a cure. If it appears cured, it will break out again”.
